title: Introducing: LOVA
content:
Photo: Fredrik Hvass

Scandinavia is once again pumping out a whole host of exciting new popstars, with the likes of Sigrid, Tove Styrke and Dagny all set to leave a serious impression on 2018.

Another name to add to that ever building list of emerging artists from Northern Europe is nineteen year old LOVA aka Lova Alvilde. Having come through the ranks of Stockholm’s Rytmus Music School which counts Tove Lo and Robyn as alumni, her debut single, You Me and the Silence is the sort of character driven off-kilter pop that we’ve come to expect from Swedish upstarts in recent years. A high energy listen that just gets better with every listen. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
